scripts.build: npm run minify-js && npm run build-widgets
scripts.minify-js: (sed -e "1i /*" -e "$a */" LICENSE && minify story-javascript.js) > story-javascript.min.js && cp story-javascript.js examples/common/tiny-qbn.js
scripts.build-tinyqbn-widgets: node -e "console.log('::TinyQBN widgets [widget]')" | cat - widgets.txt > widgets.tw && cp widgets.tw examples/common/tiny-qbn.tw
scripts.build-widgets: npm run build-tinyqbn-widgets && npm run build-basic-ability
scripts.build-demo-html: tweego -o demo.html story-javascript.js widgets.tw basic-ability.tw demo
scripts.build-demo: npm run build && npm run build-demo-html
scripts.covers-example: cd examples && tweego -o covers.html covers.tw common
scripts.localvore1-example: cd examples && tweego -o tutorial-1.html tutorial-1.tw common
scripts.localvore2-example: cd examples && tweego -o tutorial-2.html tutorial-2.tw common
scripts.localvore-example: cd examples && tweego -o localvore.html localvore.tw common
scripts.examples: npm run covers-example && npm run localvore1-example && npm run localvore2-example && npm run localvore-example
